data.pricing_trends: Average cost of flights in September ranges from $400 to $600. Hotels vary from budget hostels to luxury accommodations averaging $100 per night.
data.booking_windows: Ideal booking is 1 to 3 months ahead of travel dates, especially for popular attractions. Early reservations recommended during festival seasons.
data.demand: Increased interest during fall for cultural experiences, especially for heritage tourism.
data.competition: Costa Rica and Belize are alternative destinations with similar offerings but different cultural experiences.
